description: Returns metadata associated with a restore job that is specified by a job ID.

parameters.name: RestoreJobId
parameters.description: Uniquely identifies the job that restores a recovery point.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: Returns the account ID that owns the restore job.

nested_items.name: RestoreJobId
nested_items.description: Uniquely identifies the job that restores a recovery point.

nested_items.name: RecoveryPointArn
nested_items.description: An ARN that uniquely identifies a recovery point; for example, arn:aws:backup:us-east-1:123456789012:recovery-point:1EB3B5E7-9EB0-435A-A80B-108B488B0D45.

nested_items.name: CreationDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that a restore job is created, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of CreationDate is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.

nested_items.name: CompletionDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that a job to restore a recovery point is completed, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of CompletionDate is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Status code specifying the state of the job that is initiated by Backup to restore a recovery point.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: A message showing the status of a job to restore a recovery point.

nested_items.name: PercentDone
nested_items.description: Contains an estimated percentage that is complete of a job at the time the job status was queried.

nested_items.name: BackupSizeInBytes
nested_items.description: The size, in bytes, of the restored resource.

nested_items.name: IamRoleArn
nested_items.description: Specifies the IAM role ARN used to create the target recovery point; for example, arn:aws:iam::123456789012:role/S3Access.

nested_items.name: ExpectedCompletionTimeMinutes
nested_items.description: The amount of time in minutes that a job restoring a recovery point is expected to take.

nested_items.name: CreatedResourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource that was created by the restore job.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: Returns metadata associated with a restore job listed by resource type.

nested_items.name: RecoveryPointCreationDate
nested_items.description: The creation date of the recovery point made by the specifed restore job.

nested_items.name: CreatedBy
nested_items.description: Contains identifying information about the creation of a restore job.

nested_items.name: RestoreTestingPlanArn
nested_items.description: An Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies a restore testing plan.

nested_items.name: ValidationStatus
nested_items.description: The status of validation run on the indicated restore job.

nested_items.name: ValidationStatusMessage
nested_items.description: The status message.

nested_items.name: DeletionStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the data generated by the restore test.

nested_items.name: DeletionStatusMessage
nested_items.description: This describes the restore job deletion status.
